snippet: Mr. Stoney, acclaimed for his roles as a filmmaker, teacher and prophet of social change, lobbied for cable systems to be required to provide public access channels for members of the public.
abstract: George C Stoney, documentary filmmaker, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Stoney, acclaimed for his roles as a filmmaker, teacher and prophet of social change, lobbied for cable systems to be required to provide public access channels for members of the public.

headline.seo: George C. Stoney, Documentarian, Dies at 96
headline.main: George C. Stoney, Documentary Filmmaker, Dies at 96
headline.print_headline: George C. Stoney, Documentary Filmmaker, Dies at 96
